unnormalised: **Courier Company Announces New Delivery Hub in Guwahati**
normalised: **Courier Company Announces New Delivery Hub in Guwahati**

unnormalised: BlueDart, a leading courier and logistics company, has officially announced the opening of its latest delivery hub located at 123, GS Road, Guwahati, Assam, PIN: 781005. The new facility is strategically positioned to enhance delivery efficiency across the Northeast region, aiming to reduce transit times by up to 24 hrs. This expansion reflects the company’s commitment to serving the growing e-commerce and business sectors in the area.
normalised: B-L-U-E-D-A-R-T, a leading courier and logistics company, has officially announced the opening of its latest delivery hub located at one hundred and twenty three, G-S Road, Guwahati, Assam, P-I-N: seven eight one zero zero five. The new facility is strategically positioned to enhance delivery efficiency across the Northeast region, aiming to reduce transit times by up to twenty four hours. This expansion reflects the company’s commitment to serving the growing e-commerce and business sectors in the area.

unnormalised: The hub is equipped with state-of-the-art sorting technology and can handle a volume of approximately 10,000 parcels per day. It also incorporates a dedicated customer service center at the same address, offering support for inquiries and shipment tracking. The new center will operate from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Saturday.
normalised: The hub is equipped with state-of-the-art sorting technology and can handle a volume of approximately ten thousand parcels per day. It also incorporates a dedicated customer service center at the same address, offering support for inquiries and shipment tracking. The new center will operate from nine AM to six P-M, Monday through Saturday.

unnormalised: Mr. R.K. Sharma, Regional Manager, emphasized the importance of this investment in enhancing the company’s operational capabilities. "The Guwahati hub will significantly improve our service delivery to key areas like Itanagar, Shillong, and Imphal. Businesses and individuals can now expect faster and more reliable courier services," said Mr. Sharma at the inauguration ceremony held on 20/07/2024.
normalised: Mister R-K Sharma, Regional Manager, emphasized the importance of this investment in enhancing the company’s operational capabilities. "The Guwahati hub will significantly improve our service delivery to key areas like Itanagar, Shillong, and Imphal. Businesses and individuals can now expect faster and more reliable courier services," said Mister Sharma at the inauguration ceremony held on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The company has already onboarded 50 new employees for the Guwahati hub. BlueDart is also planning to introduce electric vehicles for last-mile delivery in Guwahati to promote sustainable logistics. For more details or to schedule a pickup, please contact the hub directly at +91-9876543210 or visit their website at www.bluedart.com.
normalised: The company has already onboarded fifty new employees for the Guwahati hub. B-L-U-E-D-A-R-T is also planning to introduce electric vehicles for last-mile delivery in Guwahati to promote sustainable logistics. For more details or to schedule a pickup, please contact the hub directly at plus ninety one dash nine eight seven six five four three two one zero or visit their website at W-W-W dot bluedart dot com.
